creator: bhealey@brighthorizons.com
text:
I can not get to the cold fusion 5.0 server adminsitrator web site.  I am 
prompted to download the file.  This is due to the web server not recognizing 
the mime type of .cfm - or at least has been the case with IIS for other mimie 
types.

Where (how) should I set this parameter so that cold fusion pages appear?

Thanks in advance
Brian

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
You need a cold fusion module for apache in order to use cold fusion pages.
I'm not sure whether or not there is such a thing available for apache 2.0 yet,
but in any case, you need to contact the cold fusion authors for assistance 
with this.

In addition, support questions should be directed to the users mailing list,
not the bug database.

Thanks.
